What is the purpose of the `getcurrencyconverters` command in Verus?

The `getcurrencyconverters` command retrieves a list of currencies that meet specific reserve requirements, specifically having at least 1000 VRSC in reserve and a VRSC reserve ratio of more than 10%. Additionally, the listed currencies must be included as reserves.

### `getcurrencyconverters "currency1" "currency2" ... | 'json object'`
Retrieves all currencies that have at least 1000 VRSC in reserve, are >10% VRSC reserve ratio, and have all listed currencies as reserves
